name: html5sortable
description: VanillaJS sortable lists and grids using native HTML5 drag and drop API.

scripts.test: rollup -c --environment test && jest && npm run standard && npm run standard-test && standard-readme
scripts.coverage: rollup -c --environment test && jest --coverage && npm run standard && npm run standard-test && standard-readme
scripts.oldtest: rollup -c --environment test && mocha test/umd/module.js && mocha test/*.js && npm run standard && npm run standard-test && standard-readme
scripts.travis: npm run cover && npm run standard
scripts.oldtravis: npm run cover && mocha test/umd/module.js && npm run standard
scripts.oldcover: rollup -c --environment test && nyc mocha test/*.js && nyc report --reporter=text-lcov | coveralls
scripts.version: npm run build && git add -A dist docs
